page.title: 19...CLUBS
page.content: The participation of families in organised clubs is not very common in this area despite the facilities which are available. Shard End Community Centre has many different types of clubs which are held each day.Many of these clubs are for the elderly in the area.People from other districts use the Centre besides the local inhabitants.From the results of a survey carried out in four schools it would seem that many families do not belong to any clubs at all.Of the clubs which adult members belonged to Social Clubs were the most popular followed by the Community Centre ,Self Defence Clubs and Sports Clubs. The most popular clubs attended by the young of the area in order of preference were :-1.Youth Clubs,2.Cubs, Brownies,Sea Cadets etc., 3.Dancing Clubs ,4.Football. ,
